vtbsim
[+define+macro]       Define hdl source 'macro' to have value "macro".
[-ID]                 Display simulator and platform identification information.
[-o exec]             Base name of vdb directory where all vtb related stuff resides.
[-M[dir=<dirname>]]   Enable incremental compilation (see vtbsim user guide).
[-Mupdate]            Enable incremental compilation and keep the Makefile up-to-date.
[-V[t]]               Verbose mode; with 't', include time information.
[-cc foo]             Use foo as the C compiler
[-cpp foo]            Use foo as the C++ compiler
[-help]               Help message.
[-ld foo]             Use foo as the linker.
[-sro]                Generate VHDL shell for Scirocco VHDL simulator.
[-mti]                Generate VHDL shell for MTI VHDL simulator.
[-nc_vhdl]            Generate VHDL shell for NC VHDL simulator.

For more options, please refer vtbsim user guide.

Summary of vtbsim environment variables:
----------------------------------------------
VTBSIM_HOME	     vtbsim distribution directory
